Kyle, for the future, remember that it IS the council's job to 
remind people of the rules and such. Hugar right to explain to Auron 
what might have been wrong in his post. 20 missiles is something 
like 16 too many according to our rules, so it should be commented 
on.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Lay off.  A council member is fine in debates, but if I 
accept

meteor 
> hit my char along with his weapons and that's just stupid.
